welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Canada Flintridge, a charming city nestled against the San Gabriel Mountains. Known for its stunning natural beauty and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is the largest terminal at Bob Hope Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the newest terminal at Bob Hope Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves as the primary international hub for LAX, with many airlines operating out of it.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves Southwest Airlines and other domestic carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves many international and domestic airlines, including Delta and Aeromexico.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic airlines such as American Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including American Airlines and Qantas.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves Delta and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including Alaska Airlines and Copa Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves United Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, including United Airlines and Air Canada.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport is a small, single-story building with basic amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport terminal and surrounding areas.
